page.title: 03Aberford C.E. School
page.content: In 1716 a charity schoolwas built which in 1817 became a church regulated National School.Today the C.E. Primary School has 86 5 to 11 year old pupils who study maths, English,art,nature,humanities,French, P.E.,R.E. and computer studies.From Aberford the pupils transfer at 11 to Boston Spa Comprehensive School. At Aberford there are currently 5 staff- Miss Tyler,Mrs.Jones,Mrs.Pringle, Mrs.Cox and Mrs Picken and headmaster Mr. Hewitt.There are five classes.There are assemblies on every day except Thursday.Times of school are 9.00am.to 12 noon and 1.00pm. to 3.15pm.There are also after school activities - football for boys and netball for girls, country dancing, gymnastics and recorder and folk guitar lessons.
